content: the calla lily market bag is a fun slightly over sized bag that can be used for so many things use it at the farmer s market to carry your produce or at the beach to hold your towel and favorite book or my personal favorite to carry your current crochet project pattern difficulty easy yarn dk #3 weight yarn sizing & yardage 22 x 15 369-400 yards all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns **love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter ** 1 you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
